title: Coastal-Cool Gold Coast Escape with Water-View Upgrade, Nightly Drinks & Daily Breakfast
description:
Glitzy, retro-inspired Miami pool club vibes welcome you to the champagne shores of Surfers Paradise at Vibe Hotel Gold Coast. This laidback hotel is perfectly positioned for the ideal Gold Coast getaway, with superb access to the famous Esplanade. Lounge in poolside cabanas and dine at the surf-themed Driftwood Social eatery, all with stunning views of the tranquil Nerang River, Gold Coast Hinterland and the ocean beyond.

Located steps from Cavill Avenue, right in the heart of Surfers Paradise with a tram stop less than five minutes away, Vibe Hotel Gold Coast is the ultimate launchpad to this glittering destination. Whether you want to get up close to marine life at Sea World, stroll along the shores of the Gold Coast’s most iconic beachfront or get lost among Pacific Fair’s 400 retail stores, this seaside hotel is the perfect retreat for relaxation after exciting days of discovery.

vendor_name: Village Roadshow Theme Parks Pty Ltd t/a Sea World Resort & Water Park
title: Gold Coast Famous Sea World Resort for Four Guests with Unlimited Entry to Four Theme Parks & VIP Inclusions
description:
Treat the family to the ultimate Gold Coast adventure with a stay at Sea World Resort, located on the glittering Main Beach. Included in your escape is unlimited theme park entry to Sea World, Warner Bros. Movie World, Wet'n'Wild and Paradise Country (plus lots of bonus inclusions). Pop next door to Sea World and experience The New Atlantis, Sea World's newest and most immersive entertainment precinct - experience sky-high thrills on the wooden coaster The Leviathan and brave the colossal currents of the Vortex. Then, visit Warner Bros. Movie World, home to DC Rivals HyperCoaster, the tallest, longest and fastest ride in the Southern Hemisphere.

Experience the pure fun of Wet ‘n’ Wild, home of Australia's biggest and most extreme water slides. Plus, get up close to unique Australian wildlife with entry to Paradise Country. After theme park days, the sun-drenched Gold Coast has iconic beaches, gorgeous hinterland trails and top-notch dining to experience. Make time to kick back at the resort's award-winning Hatsuhana Japanese Restaurant, pull up a seat at onsite Shoreline Restaurant for a buffet inspired by the ocean, feast on pizza at Melrose Italian or soak up the sun at Boatshed Bar & Grill.

No matter if it’s your first visit or your tenth, the Gold Coast is filled with endless delights to please travellers of all types, and QT’s effortless fusion of coastal tranquillity and eclectic atmosphere acts as the perfect launchpad for indulgent adventures. Each one of the contemporary, light-filled rooms - boasting ocean views - has been carefully crafted to balance rest and relaxation with bold design elements that pack a punch, and the private balcony is the perfect place to take it all in.

After a restful night’s sleep and time spent admiring the coastal glow of the morning sun, you will be well placed to take on a day of adventures near and far. From the luminous pool, the myriad of celebrated and sophisticated restaurants or the indulgent spa, there is no shortage of wondrous experiences to be found within the hotel. When the time comes to venture further, Cavill Avenue is nearby, along with bustling Broadbeach and the Gold Coast’s famous theme parks, all within a 30-minute drive.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up to glittering water vistas with a guaranteed upgrade to an Ocean View Room
- Savour one of the finest chef-served breakfasts in town each day at the Bazaar restaurant
- Sip a daily pre-dinner house beer, wine or soft drink per adult at Stingray Lounge
- Make the most of A$50 food and drink credit per room to use at any onsite restaurant and bars
- Relax with four A$20 spa credits for separate treatments of 60 minutes or more (selected days)
- Enjoy complimentary onsite parking and Wi-Fi throughout your stay
- Recover from the night before with a guaranteed 1pm late checkout

**Travelling with family?** Choose the QT Twin Ocean View room - up to two kids (aged 12 years and under) stay free with accommodation only.

**Longer stay bonus:** Extend your stay to five or six nights in any room type and receive A$70 dining credit total per room. Add to the indulgence when you stay seven nights or more and enjoy a total of A$85 dining credit per room to use at any onsite restaurant and bar. Stays of five nights or more will also have weekend surcharges waived.
offer_address: 7 Staghorn Avenue, Surfers Paradise, Queensland 4217, Australia

Treat the whole family to the ultimate escape at the newly refurbished Paradise Resort Gold Coast, a multi-award-winning, fun-filled family haven with its very own ice-skating rink, Kids' Club and three-storey water park that's recently undergone a phenomenal 12-million-dollar renovation. Voted Australia's Best Family Resort ten years in a row by leading family travel magazine Holidays with Kids, this action-packed hotel sits just moments from the bustling hub of Surfers Paradise and its beautiful beaches.

Stay in a stylish Superior Resort Room with easy access to the splash-tastic water park and enjoy quality time together amid a range of exciting activities, live entertainment and top-class facilities, including a jungle gym and climbing wall. The incredible Kids' Club Mini Fun Park offers complimentary daily supervision for kids aged from six weeks to 12 years, with Astro's Space Station, an Under Water World with buried treasure, pyjama parties, disco nights, arts, crafts and so much more. This self-proclaimed 'heaven for kids, paradise for parents' lets the children play while the adults take a well-deserved break. Plunge into the outdoor heated lagoon and sip poolside daiquiris, let hassle-free daily housekeeping take care of the cleaning, and keep even the most discerning little food critics happy with the range of onsite dining options.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Two children (12 and under) stay free with full package inclusions
- Feel like VIPs with a complimentary upgrade from a Resort Room to a Superior Resort Room
- Fuel up for a fun-filled day with daily continental breakfast at Penguins Restaurant
- Daily complimentary Kids' Club session for two children (choice of morning, afternoon or evening, for children aged six weeks to 12 years)
- Have a splash-tastic time with unlimited use of the Z4K Water Park
- Adults can relax with a welcome bottle of wine
- Enjoy a range of daily activities and entertainment for all ages
- Stay connected with complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi

**Bunkhouse Upgrade Available:** Featuring a bright set of single bunks, a gaming console and an extra TV, Junior Bunkhouse Rooms keep the kids entertained while adults enjoy space to relax.

**Travelling as a larger group?** Upgrade to a Superior Resort Interconnecting Room for up to four adults and four children (12 and under). It's double the space - and double the fun!

title: Gold Coast: Private Helicopter Flight with Gourmet Two-Course Winery Lunch & Champagne
description:
Soak up the magic of Queensland from above on this one-of-a-kind Gold Coast private helicopter experience with a gourmet two-course lunch with matched wines at Sirromet Wines - a family-owned and run winery situated at picturesque Mount Cotton. Fly from Gold Coast Airport and reach new heights as you glide over soul-stirring landscapes in air-conditioned comfort with a glass of champagne in hand. Watch as the gleaming skyscrapers of Surfers Paradise, the famed beaches of the Gold Coast and the lush terrain of the Moreton Bay islands disappear below you.

The indulgence continues as you arrive at Sirromet's private helipad, before being escorted to the winery's Tuscan Terrace. Enjoy a two-course lunch showcasing the very best local produce, followed by a tasting at the award-winning cellar door. The winery's location within the Granite Belt region and the unique combination of rich soil, high altitude and cool climate provide the perfect location for growing grapes, while master winemakers use both traditional methods and new technology, resulting in exquisite wines you'll love. The experience takes approximately four to five hours and promises to show you a side of the Gold Coast you’ve never seen before.
